property.name: Rules
property.value: {SUPER SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost. Then if you have no shields, you may use this card's Super Shield Trigger ability.) ■ Choose a card in the battle zone that costs 5 or less and put it into that owners graveyard. {SUPER}Destroy all your opponent's creatures that cost 7 or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ This creature can attack your opponent on the turn you put it into the battle zone. ■ This creature attacks your opponent each turn if able. ■ While you have 2 or more Jokers in the battle zone or your mana zone, this creature gets +3000 power and has "double breaker". (A creature that has "double breaker" breaks 2 shields.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) ■ Whenever this creature attacks, one of your creatures in the battle zone gets "speed attacker" until the end of the turn.

card.name: Sagrada Familia, Vizier of Instant Seal

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ While this creature is tapped, your opponent can't use the "shield trigger" ability of spells.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ This creature can't attack. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.
